item.title: The Donald was not created in a vacuum
item.author: Andrada Balmez,Shaul Simmons,
item.description: Donald Trump is, as a bullyish toddler of a man, a hugely amusing individual. Except, perhaps, to those in the US whose lives may be a little more impacted by his caricature lunacy. We have to look more deeply at the root of the problem: the Republican Party itself He is, at heart, a TV â€¦
